DESCRIPTION: The #yActive Ghostflame can be Ignited by meeting its listed Ignition requirements.
#yActivate the next Ghostflame. If it's Ignited, #yExtinguish it.
#yActivate the previous Ghostflame. If it's Ignited, #yExtinguish it.
Intensity increases the amount of damage, Burn, and Block applied by Ghostflames when Ignited.
Burning creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Burn is halved (rounding up).
Allows Ghostflame to become Ignited again, resetting its Ignition requirements.
Triggers the Ignition effect described on a Ghostflame.
Triggers the Ignition effect described on a Ghostflame, even if it was already Ignited.
Can't be upgraded. If all #b6 Seals have been played this combat, obtain #pThe #pBroken #pSeal and remove the Seals from your deck.
If this card is Exhausted, it is immediately played.
